remarks: The union of a nonempty, bounded set of positive reals is a positive real.  Part of Proposition 9-3.3 of [Gleason] p. 122.  (Contributed by NM, 19-May-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
